org.accada.epcis.repository
Class QueryPostHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler
      org.accada.epcis.repository.QueryPostHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.apache.axis.Handler
public class QueryPostHandler
extends org.apache.axis.handlers.BasicHandler

This is an Axis message chain handler which handles outgoing SOAP messages when they leave the EPCIS query service (QueryOperationsModule). This handler performs the cleanup such as closing the database connection and storing the subscriptions back to the servlet context.

Author:
Marco Steybe
See Also:

Method Detail

invoke

public void invoke(org.apache.axis.MessageContext msgContext)
            throws org.accada.epcis.soapapi.ImplementationException
Invokes this SoapPostHandler which performs post processing for the EPCIS query service, such as closing the database.

Parameters:
msgContext - the MessageContext to process with this InitHandler.
Throws:
org.accada.epcis.soapapi.ImplementationException - If an error reading the configuration or setting up the database occured.
See Also:
Handler.invoke(org.apache.axis.MessageContext)
